name: Small Talk & Zombies
description:
Which sounds worse: Getting your brain eaten or engaging in small talk?

Patrick is going to have to figure that out real quick. He wakes up in a world filled with zombies roaming the streets for brains and content, and deduces that there might be a way to bring people back. But does the end justify the means? Maybe getting your brain eaten isn't so bad...

This game is based off a dream I had, which probably says a lot about how my subconscious perceives talking to people I don't know. It's the first game that I've ever actually completed, and I did it in about two weeks for NaNoReNo 2022. It's only like ~15 minutes long, but I hope it's enjoyable.
